intro:
Gentle touches. 
Playful flirting. 
Pure relaxation.
description:
Welcome to a private spa where relaxation isn’t the only thing in the air.

In Spa Massage Girls: Love & Relax, you’ll enjoy soothing massage minigames while getting to know a group of charming girls through lighthearted, flirty conversations. Every interaction brings you closer to unlocking new scenes, reactions, and special moments.

Balance calm hands with smart choices as you learn what each girl enjoys, how she responds to your moves, and when to push… or slow things down.

Relax, connect, and let the atmosphere do the rest.


FEATURES:

● Minigames in the spa: Simple, satisfying gameplay focused on timing, precision, and relaxation.

● Interactive conversations: Choose your answers and discover how each girl reacts to your style.

● Unlockable images and moments: Progress through each route to reveal exclusive content.

● Different personalities: From sweet and shy to confident and teasing, every girl feels unique.

● Multiple outcomes: Your performance and decisions shape each experience.


Can you find the perfect balance between relaxation and romance?

Step into the spa and enjoy the experience at your own pace. 
Are you ready?
